en.no_text_key: ❌ The text corresponding to this key is not found, contact the developer!
en.no_use_interface: ❌ While in the dungeon, use the dungeon interface!

request_subscribe.text:
📜 | Dear user!

🎭 | The bot has an official telegram channel and a group, go to the group to find a topic for conversation or ask questions, as well as subscribe to the channel to receive interesting bonuses and news!

❤ | This is not necessary, but we will be very grateful to you!

en.no_account: You do not have a registered account in the bot, please go to the bot and register to get access to this command.
en.add_me: ❤ | Everyone can send a request to friends 🌀{username} by clicking on the button below!
en.start_menu: 🎋 | Hey {username}, glad to welcome you!A small tamagotchi-type game bot, only with dinosaurs!🦖 🥚 | What is a tamagotchi? Ptamagochi is a game with a virtual pet that needs to be fed, cared for, played, and so on. 🗻 | What kind of bot? In this bot you have to take care of your pet, travel, conquer the dungeon and completely immerse yourself in this RPG world! 🎮 | How to start playing? Press the button 🍡 Start playing! ❤ | Waiting in the game!
en.in_development: This feature is under development, follow the news in order to find out when the team will work!
